column5: Hi all,  The weekend was great out on the ice... didnt see less than 7 inches anywhere we drilled.  Cars and trucks out but staying closer to shore...  Perch were thick both days.... kept 20 over 11 inches today.... threw back to many to count.  Now im ready for the big lake.. Hopefully next week people can walk to some spots safely but who know if the weatherman will comply
Uploaded with ImageShack.us   Uploaded with ImageShack.us
Nice catch.  Any hiccups jumping the crack close to shore?
Thats what we like to hear! Thanks for the great report.
I was on the east side of the bay...no cracks to worry about in my travels...sparse snow..mostly glare ice  saw 3 pike cruising too over the 2 days..they wouldn't go for it
